alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Fort Bend; Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 5:54AM CDT until May 10 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Fort Bend County in southeastern Texas... Brazoria County in southeastern Texas... East central Matagorda County in southeastern Texas... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 554 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Riverstone to near Richwood to 16 miles southeast of Sargent, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Pearland, southeastern Missouri City, Lake Jackson, Alvin, Angleton, Freeport, Clute, Manvel, West Columbia, Surfside Beach, Fresno, Richwood, Brazoria, Jones Creek, Danbury, Arcola, Iowa Colony, Oyster Creek, Holiday Lakes and Bailey`s Prairie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
